item.title: Creating Personal Website Using Hugo
item.description: Introduction to Hugo Hugo is one of the most popular open-source static site generators. With the ability of generating most websites within seconds, it provides the users with the worldâ€™s fastest framework for building personal websites. The installation and deployment of Hugo are simple and efficient. With just 7 simple steps, we can easily use Hugo to build our own personal websites. Before introducing the 7 steps, the reader needs to get a Github account.
